title: DELL Latitude 5285 Intel® Core™ i5 256 GB 31.2 cm (12.3") 8 GB Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac) Windows 10 Pro Black
description:
DELL Latitude 5285 Intel® Core™ i5 256 GB 31.2 cm (12.3") 8 GB Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac) Windows 10 Pro Black


Security with style. Dell’s most secure 2-in-1 with the power of a laptop and flexibility of a tablet. Featuring a new design and optional keyboard (sold separately). Set up for success The auto-deploy kickstand is an industry-first feature designed for a smooth work experience. Place your Latitude 5285 2-in-1 on a flat surface and watch the kickstand automatically extend. It can rotate up to 150 degrees for multiple viewing angles. The ultimate defense system Best-in-class hardware security: Protect your hardware when accessing your company’s network thanks to the FIPS 140-2, TCG certified TPM2.0, FIPS 201 certified smartcard reader, touch fingerprint reader, self-encryption drive and NFC. Protect your identity: The Dell ControlVault™ provides the strongest authentication capabilities available. It stores and protects your passwords, biometric authentication, and security codes, so your credentials will be secured no matter where your work takes you. Control your data: Work worry free with powerful security solutions built into your Latitude 5285 2-in-1. Dell Data Protection includes Endpoint Security Suite Enterprise, Secure Lifecycle and Encryption for outstanding security that’s easily managed from one console. Innovative design On-the-go flexibility: At less than 2lbs, the Latitude 5285 2-in-1 is built for mobility. From meetings around the office to traveling across the country, its thin and light frame can fit anywhere. Enjoy the view, all day: Take in the 12.3" Full HD screen without sacrificing your battery life. Up to 12 hours 29 mins2 of battery keeps up with your screen’s performance , while Corning® Gorilla® Glass 4 guards against drops and rough surfaces. Boost productivity: Streamline your workflow with an optional travel keyboard and active pen. The thin, lightweight keyboard attaches magnetically for easy transitions between laptop and tablet modes, while the active pen lets you take notes directly on the screen and magnetically attaches to your device when not in use. Powerful and easy to manage Reliable performance: Equipped with the latest generation of Intel® Core™ I processors, it’s powerful performance for your workday. All-day battery life: Make the most of your workday with up to 12 hours 29 mins2 of battery life. Automatic updates: Dell Client Command Suite comes with a set of automation tools that assists in device monitoring, deploying images, updating and more, to maximize your hardware and software investments and save time. Diagnostics, anywhere: Intel® vPro™ manages and protects your device from software attacks. Diagnose and repair your Latitude 5285 2-in-1 remotely, all while reducing power use. Extensive connectivity: Conveniently connect with a single cable or wirelessly with the optional Dell Dock and Dell Wireless Dock. Upgrade to 4G/LTE and stay connected anywhere. Featuring Windows 10 Store your ideas: Windows Ink allows you to incorporate your thoughts and ideas into the digital space. Use your optional active pen to take notes, draw and comment with this feature that’s directly integrated into your apps. Seamlessly switch tasks: Continuum optimizes content for the screen you’re currently viewing. By smoothly transitioning from laptop to tablet mode, you can stay productive with or without your keyboard. Log in with ease: Activate Windows Hello via optional infrared camera to facilitate facial recognition for easy and secure access.

title: DELL Venue 8 Intel Atom® 16 GB 20.3 cm (8") 2 GB Wi-Fi 4 (802.11n) Android Black
description:
DELL Venue 8 Intel Atom® 16 GB 20.3 cm (8") 2 GB Wi-Fi 4 (802.11n) Android Black


Feature rich versatility High-def details: Enjoy every detail of your favorite apps, like Netflix, on a stunning HD screen. Thin and light: At less than 9.5mm thin, you can lay this lightweight tablet on your lap. Relax with your favorite Android-based games, or pop it in your bag and get going. Picture perfect: Snap amazing photos and video with a rear facing 3MP camera or video chat like a pro with the front facing VGA camera. Always up to date: Dell Venue 7 comes loaded with the latest Android Jellybean operating system. Expect enhanced performance and fun new features. Seamless connectivity All-access from anywhere: PocketCloud 2.0 gives you access to your content and applications from a PC, smartphone or tablet so you can update and share your files wherever you go. GPS and location-based services: Know where you’re going and where you’ve been with location services that are available even when you’re offline. Reliable productivity High-performance: Speed through your to-do list with a powerful Intel® Atom™ (up to 1.6GHz Dual-Core) processor Z2580. Power up: Spend more time away from the outlet with all-day battery life. Keep your schedule running smoothly with up to 10 hours6 of power and battery support. Store more: Take your multimedia and other files with you with up to 16GB7 of hard drive storage plus a micro SD slot for up to 32GB of additional storage.

title: DELL Latitude 5179 4G Intel® Core™ m5 LTE 256 GB 27.4 cm (10.8") 8 GB Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac) Windows 10 Pro Black
description:
DELL Latitude 5179 4G Intel® Core™ m5 LTE 256 GB 27.4 cm (10.8") 8 GB Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac) Windows 10 Pro Black


The world’s most secure 2-in-1 for business. A one-two punch of flexibility and reliability, Intel® processors and optional keyboard (sold separately) make this 2-in-1 ideal for working on the go. The flexibility of two.The manageability of one. Easy fleet management: IT has the capability to manipulate BIOS settings and configure systems with ample flexibility that organizational IT infrastructures require. Tablet to laptop and back again: Effortlessly convert your tablet with the optional Latitude 11 Keyboard or Latitude 11 Slim Keyboard to instantly gain full laptop productivity and extended battery life. Packed with power: Expect high performance with the latest 6th Gen Intel® Core™ M processor (vPro) and up to 8GB memory. Government-grade security for your business. Select configurations of the Latitude 5000 Series 2-in-1 offer additional security features to enhance your protection (Coming soon). Integrated authentication: The integrated fingerprint and smartcard reader ensures the highest level of safety for your system and your business. Dell Data Protection: Count on Dell for the world’s most secure client devices, protected by comprehensive encryption, advanced authentication and malware prevention solutions. Self-encrypting drives: Dell SEDs provide hardware based encryption for stronger security—independent of the operating system and with zero impact on performance. As stunning as it is safe. Well-built beauty: Every Latitude 11 is constructed with premium materials, including magnesium alloy, and is finished off with soft-touch paint. It’s made with Corning® Concore Glass, providing 5x better surface damage resistance for thinner devices and greater durability than traditional displays. Interact with Clarity: Enjoy stunning resolution with the 10.8" Ultrasharp™ FHD display, optimized for intuitive touch interaction. All in view: Take advantage of multi-angle viewing up to 150 degrees with optional Latitude 11 Slim Keyboard.

title: Lenovo ThinkPad X60 Intel® Core™ Duo 80 GB 30.7 cm (12.1") 1 GB Black
description:
Lenovo ThinkPad X60 Intel® Core™ Duo 80 GB 30.7 cm (12.1") 1 GB Black


The Lenovo Design Advantage Designed to be the best engineered tablet notebook, the ThinkPad X60 Tablet has capabilities that allow you to use the notebook the way you need whether indoors or outdoors, with digitizer pen or touch input. - MultiTouch/MultiView display feature permits touch or pen interaction. - MultiView feature improves viewing outside and in sunlight as well as a 170° viewing angle. - X6 Tablet UltraBase provides light weight, fully-featured mobile docking solution. The ThinkPad X60 Tablet helps make easier the work that's important to you. Portability Without Compromise The Lenovo ThinkPad X60 Tablet is designed to provide the ultimate in portability without sacrificing features, performance, or battery life. Leading mobile connectivity The X60 Tablet is MIMO ready, compatible with the new and faster 802.11n Multiple-Input Multiple-Output wireless standard, as well as every other wireless options.

title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 SM-T530N 16 GB 25.6 cm (10.1") 1.5 GB Wi-Fi 4 (802.11n) Android Black
description:
Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 SM-T530N 16 GB 25.6 cm (10.1") 1.5 GB Wi-Fi 4 (802.11n) Android Black


Inspiring Mobile Freedom in Your Life - Perfect for all ages, Samsung’s next-generation Galaxy Tab4 line offers an exceptional multimedia experience in a more premium and portable design, making it ideal for viewing or sharing content with friends and family. Rich Multimedia Experience - Available in 10.1-inch, 8.0-inch and 7.0-inch screen sizes, the Galaxy Tab4’s vivid WXGA display with a 16:10 screen ratio provides users with a brilliant viewing experience while watching videos, playing games, or reading digital contents. - With Multi Window functionality, users are able to seamlessly switch between apps and windows, as well as drag and drop contents with ease. Fun & Shareable Services* The new Galaxy Tab4 line is perfect for the whole family as it comes equipped with a number of fun and shareable services allowing users to access content and stay connected with friends wherever they are, including: - Group Play: Share and play music, documents and games with friends in realtime - Samsung Link: Share and play content across smart devices anytime, anywhere - WatchON: Watch TV shows and movies on any device, anywhere in your home or on the go. * Availability of features and functions listed above may be differed by device type or regions. Not all services will be provided. Please check product specification sheet for each product for details. Sleek & Portable Designs - The Galaxy Tab4 line all feature a textured, premium look and feel back cover. - With a slim design and weights, the Galaxy Tab4 10.1-inch, 8-inch and 7-inch models provide maximum portability while still allowing users to enjoy beautiful screens.

title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 SM-T870 Qualcomm Snapdragon 256 GB 27.9 cm (11") 8 GB Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) Silver
description:
Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 SM-T870 Qualcomm Snapdragon 256 GB 27.9 cm (11") 8 GB Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) Silver


Our most advanced Galaxy Tab changes how you work and play Meet Galaxy Tab S7 and S7+. Work and play on the ultra smooth 120Hz display, powered by our most powerful chipset. Get a PC-like experience with the snap of a keyboard, or use the ultra low latency S Pen to write like never before. An immersive tablet experience changing the way you work and play. So smooth, you have to see it to believe it At 120Hz, the responsive display instantly reacts to what's on your screen. It intelligently adjusts the refresh rate based on your content and helps you save battery as you watch and scroll. Your favourite shows, with abrand new view Like the cinema, you get a massive screen made crystal clear with the largest Super AMOLED display on the Galaxy Tab S7+ and Quad speaker sound by AKG and Dolby Atmos. The fastest processor ever in Galaxy Tab The Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 Plus Mobile Platform is a breakthrough in processing power. The intuitive and intelligent chipset is extremely fast and powerful, with minimal lag, so it can run intense games and multitask with ease. Harness its power whenever the mood strikes. Intelligent battery to keep you going Binge-watch your favourite shows from sunrise to sunset. The biggest battery on a Galaxy Tab is built to keep you going.7 Even after all that, you don't have to power down. Power up and keep going with Fast Charging, the fastest tablet charger. The biggest leap in S Pen Completely made over for a comfortable, solid grip, S Pen also has ultra low latency so there's little lag between what you think and do. It's S Pen's biggest leap in responsiveness, giving you a true writing experience. Then when you're done, magnetically attach it to the back of your Tab. Effortless comes in 165° Take it all the way back to 165°. It's freedom you never thought you'd get from a tablet keyboard. The Book Cover Keyboard's free stop hinge lets you find your perfect angle for sending emails, blogging, studying — you name it. Incredibly thin and light, yet durable Coming in Mystic Black, Mystic Silver and Mystic Bronze hues, this design utilises an advanced dual colour anodising technique for enduring colour that's robust, yet stylish. Its exquisite aluminum textures are created by polycrystalline diamonds, with a micro-sand blasted finish soft to the touch. A powerful experience enhanced with Galaxy favourites RAM 6GB RAM to binge-watch and multitask with little lag. Storage 128GB. It's the storage of a laptop on your tablet to save all your photos and footage. External Memory Compatible with a microSD card up to 1TB if you need to store more.11 Daily Board Your smart home dashboard that lets you manage connected appliances, or use as a scheduler and memo board. Call and text on other devices A way to control your smartphone and answer calls and texts right from your tablet. Auto Hotspot One-touch tethering that turns your tablet into a Wi-Fi hub. Quick Share The ability to easily share files to nearby devices, simultaneously. Double tap to wake Your screen turns on when you double tap it.

title: Fujitsu STYLISTIC Q702 Intel® Core™ i3 64 GB 29.5 cm (11.6") 4 GB Wi-Fi 4 (802.11n) Windows 7 Black, Silver
description:
Fujitsu STYLISTIC Q702 Intel® Core™ i3 64 GB 29.5 cm (11.6") 4 GB Wi-Fi 4 (802.11n) Windows 7 Black, Silver


The Fujitsu STYLISTIC Q702 is the perfect choice for mobile professionals looking for high-performance without compromising on versatility. With its attachable keyboard option, this lightweight hybrid tablet PC enables easy content creation and consumption. Either use it as a tablet when traveling or attach the keyboard and convert the STYLISTIC Q702 into a traditional notebook for additional usability in the office. The 29.5 cm (11.6-inch) display with pen and finger input support offers you excellent flexibility while optional 4G/LTE completes the picture of a professional tablet. Notebook and Tablet PC in One. Benefit from ultimate versatility. With the attachable keyboard, you can turn your lightweight tablet into a traditional notebook for additional usability in business meetings or at your desk. Mobile Office on the Go A light weight, long battery runtime, ultimate connectivity as well as a robust magnesium cover for enhanced stability convert your STYLISTIC hybrid tablet into a real mobile office to support you on business trips. Ultimate Security Protect your most valuable asset - your data, with features like Fujitsu's Advanced Theft Protection, an integrated fingerprint sensor or an optional TPM module, granting you ultimate security. Content Creation Not only enjoy the STYLISTIC Q702 as a tablet to consume content, but attach the keyboard or use the touch-screen for direct pen and finger input to create valuable content. The hybrid tablet allows both, depending on the situation and your personal preferences.


Key Specifications:
- **Other features**: Processor socket: BGA 1023; Processor ARK ID: 65697
- **Operational conditions**: Operating temperature (T-T): 5 - 35 °C; Operating relative humidity (H-H): 20 - 85%

title: HP ElitePad 1000 G2 Healthcare Intel Atom® 128 GB 25.6 cm (10.1") 4 GB Wi-Fi 4 (802.11n) Windows 8.1 Pro Silver
description:
HP ElitePad 1000 G2 Healthcare Intel Atom® 128 GB 25.6 cm (10.1") 4 GB Wi-Fi 4 (802.11n) Windows 8.1 Pro Silver


Integrate workflows, access and update healthcare information systems, improve caregiver productivity, and enhance patient interaction with the HP ElitePad 1000 Healthcare Tablet, a Windows 10 solution designed in tandem with healthcare and hospital professionals. From mobile executives to field technicians, you’ll benefit from an assortment of industry-specific software and hardware options. Ready for healthcare - Use this durable, lightweight solution throughout your clinical environment. The shell has been treated with an antimicrobial preservative to protect the outer casing2 from degradation. Assist with regulatory requirements - Help keep patient data secure with a certified smart card reader; HP Client Security, HP BIOS Protection, and Trusted Platform Module (TPM) and full disk encryption. Gain 360-degree quality assurance - Help reduce the risk of medical errors by using the 2D barcode reader (select configurations) to validate personnel and patients and catalogue and administer medication. Dictate accurately with built-in noise cancelling software. Enable clinical workflow flexibility - Create the best solution for your environment with a suite of optional accessories. Use the tablet pen to enable data input on the move or a docking station to create a desktop-like environment when you’re at a desk or nurse’s station.

title: ASUS ZenPad 8.0 Z581KL-1A039A tablet 4G Qualcomm Snapdragon LTE 16 GB 20.3 cm (8") 2 GB Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac) Android 6.0 Black
description:
ASUS ZenPad 8.0 Z581KL-1A039A tablet 4G Qualcomm Snapdragon LTE 16 GB 20.3 cm (8") 2 GB Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac) Android 6.0 Black


Cinematic entertainment with 2K IPS display ASUS ZenPad 3 8.0 is a premium 8-inch tablet with vivid 2K (2048 x 1536 resolution) visuals and cinematic audio for truly immersive entertainment. Its fashion-inspired design with a brushed metallic finish and detailed concentric-circle button provides a sublime level of elegance and beauty, while a super-fast hexa-core processor and 4GB RAM delivers powerful performance in any usage scenario. Coupled with the all-new ZenUI 3.0 interface with added intelligence, ZenPad 3 8.0 delivers an incredible tablet experience like no other. Design Fashion-inspired design ASUS ZenPad 3 8.0 has a modern contemporary design that turns heads. Its forged aluminum body weighs just 320g, and has a premium leather-patterned rear cover that feels great to the touch. Craftsmanship Metallic finish with concentric-circle button ASUS ZenPad 3 8.0 has a brushed metallic finish and a finely-detailed concentric-circle button that reflects a balance of beauty and strength. Its exquisite surface is achieved thanks to a hyper-fine sanding process, before being polished to a smooth anodized finish. Multimedia It’s all in the details ASUS ZenPad 3 8.0 delivers mobile entertainment like you’ve never experienced. Its incredible 8-inch 2K (2048 x 1536 resolution) IPS display features wide 178-degree viewing angles and exclusive ASUS VisualMaster and ASUS Tru2Life+ technologies for a cinematic experience. TV-grade optimization ZenPad 3 8.0 has a dedicated display processor like those found in the latest high-end TVs. We call this ASUS Tru2Life+ technology, and with good reason. Every pixel is optimized to deliver incredible contrast and sharpness for beautiful, true-to-life images. Tru2Life+ also has motion-estimation and motion-compensation (MEMC) algorithms for smooth, blur-free video that doesn’t judder. Intelligent contrast Intelligent contrast enhancement analyzes and optimizes each pixel in an image before it is reproduced, rendering more detail in the highlights and shadows to reveal the true beauty in your pictures. Sharpness optimization Dramatically-enhanced detail for sharper, more lifelike images. SonicMaster DTS headphone X ASUS SonicMaster technology gives you higher volumes, improved audio delivery and additional audio effects. ASUS ZenPad 3 8.0 has dual front speakers for higher volume levels. And for full-immersion, DTS Headphone:X™ delivers an immersive, cinematic 7.1-channel surround sound experience straight to your headphones. Performance Supercharged gaming power Beneath the beautiful exterior of ASUS ZenPad 3 8.0 lies a performance beast. With a super-fast hexa-core processor, 4GB RAM and Adreno 510 GPU, ASUS ZenPad 3 8.0 handles the latest games with ease and lets you blast through productivity tasks. A power revolution A high-capacity 4650mAh battery gives you almost 11 hours* of battery life to keep the entertainment going. PixelMaster Capture the magic of the moment The 8MP PixelMaster camera captures stunning, high-resolution photos with zero shutter lag. Its industry-leading Low Light mode employs pixel-merging technology to capture up to 400% brighter photos at night or in low-light environments, without the need for a flash. ZenUI New interface with added intelligence Incredible hardware demands spectacular software — and that’s where ZenUI 3.0 comes in to brighten your mobile experience, improve productivity and make everyday life just that little bit more fun. Weather updates come with real-time animations, or check the time through the stylish clock widget. Feel the depth of parallax scrolling as you swipe through your apps, and appreciate how the subtle blurry effect keeps your focus on the foreground. ZenUI 3.0 isn’t just an interface — it’s the best friend who accompanies you everywhere. ASUS Zen Clutch A premium fashion accessory ASUS Zen Clutch is a tailor-made fashion accessory for your ASUS ZenPad 3 8.0. This stylish cover protects ZenPad without adding bulk to its compact, lightweight design. Inside, Zen Clutch incudes convenient slots for your ID and credit cards.

- **Weight & dimensions**: Width: 136.4 mm; Depth: 205.4 mm; Height: 7.57 mm; Weight: 320 g
- **Battery**: Battery technology: Lithium Polymer (LiPo); Battery capacity: 4680 mAh; Battery capacity: 18 Wh; Battery life (max): 11 h
- **Software**: Platform: Android; Operating system installed: Android 6.0
- **Design**: Form factor: Slate; Product colour: Black; Device type: Mobile tablet
- **Ports & interfaces**: USB 3.2 Gen 1 (3.1 Gen 1) Type-C ports quantity: 1; HDMI ports quantity: 0

- **Camera**: Rear camera type: Single camera; Rear camera resolution (numeric): 8 MP; Video recording modes: 1080p; Front camera resolution (numeric): 2 MP
- **Audio**: Number of built-in speakers: 2
- **Graphics**: Graphics card family: Adreno; Graphics card: Adreno 510

- **Display**: Display diagonal: 20.3 cm (8"); Panel type: IPS; Display resolution: 2048 x 1536 pixels; Touch technology: Multi-touch
